high_descs: Turn right and walk forward then turn right again and walk to the desk, turning left to face it
Pick up the book from the desk
Turn left and walk over to the lamp on the left side of the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine the book under the light of the lamp

high_descs: Turn right and head to the desk in the opposite corner of the room.
Pick up the book on the desk to the left of the CD.
turn left and move to face the trash bin to the left of the desk.
Observe the book in your possession.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the book on the desk and observe it.

high_descs: Turn right, walk to the chair, turn right, walk to desk, turn left to face desk.
Pick up book that is to the right of the pen.
Turn left, walk past end of desk, turn right to face heating unit.
Put the book on the heating unit.
anns.task_desc: Put a book on the heating unit.
